g1.title: Advanced Threat Detection & SOAR Platform
g1.description: Implement Security Orchestration, Automation, and Response (SOAR) platform with ML-based threat detection and automated incident response
features_planned: Advanced threat detection with ML-based anomaly detection
Automated security incident response workflows
Security orchestration, automation, and response (SOAR)
Behavioral analytics for user activity monitoring
Threat intelligence integration with real-time feeds
Automated playbook execution for incident response
Forensic data collection and analysis
features_implemented: ✅ ML-based anomaly detection with behavioral analytics
✅ Automated incident response workflows with playbook engine
✅ SOAR platform with threat intelligence integration
✅ Forensic data collection with chain of custody
✅ Advanced threat scoring and risk assessment

g2.title: Data Loss Prevention & Privacy Protection
g2.description: Implement comprehensive DLP system with data classification, privacy protection, and regulatory compliance automation
features_planned: Data loss prevention (DLP) integration with content scanning
Data classification and handling with automated policy enforcement
Privacy protection with data anonymization and encryption
Data residency enforcement and monitoring
Right to erasure with secure data deletion
Consent management and tracking
Data processing records with audit trails
features_implemented: ✅ Content scanning with ML-based pattern detection
✅ Data classification with automated policy enforcement
✅ Privacy protection with anonymization and encryption
✅ Right to erasure with secure deletion

g3.title: Privileged Access Management & Zero Trust
g3.description: Implement PAM system with just-in-time access, session recording, and advanced zero-trust security controls
features_planned: Privileged access management (PAM) system with role-based access
Just-in-time access provisioning with time-limited credentials
Session recording and monitoring for privileged sessions
Advanced zero-trust security model implementation
Continuous verification with adaptive trust scoring
Network micro-segmentation with policy enforcement
Behavioral analytics for privileged user monitoring
features_implemented: ✅ PAM system with just-in-time access provisioning

g4.title: Compliance Automation & Risk Management
g4.description: Implement advanced compliance automation with risk assessment, policy as code, and automated remediation
features_planned: Automated compliance scanning and remediation
Risk assessment workflows with quantified scoring
Policy as code with version control and approval workflows
Compliance dashboard with real-time status monitoring
Automated evidence collection for audits with blockchain proof
Vendor risk assessment with continuous security monitoring
Regulatory mapping with requirement tracking
features_implemented: ✅ Policy as code with version control

conflict_avoidance.avoids_a2: Different monitoring focus - security vs observability
conflict_avoidance.avoids_a3: Builds on A3's security foundation with advanced features
conflict_avoidance.avoids_a4: Security-specific AI, not general AI intelligence
conflict_avoidance.avoids_a5: No platform overlap - security controls only
conflict_avoidance.avoids_a6: No dev tool overlap - pure security functionality
